virtual void Exit ()
 Called by TeleKarma when this state handler is the active state handler but is about to be replaced as active state handler by another state handler class instance.

Protected Attributes

TeleKarma * tk

Detailed Description

Abstract superclass that defines the interface for all state handler delegate classes.

TeleKarma delegates state handling to subclasses of this class. State handlers are responsible for detecting environmental events (user input, telephony events), changing the current state handler in TeleKarma, and carrying out actions via the TeleKarma interface.
